topic.title: Can you create a Zite using Django? Create Zites using Python?
topic.body:
Hi, I started learning how to program for web with Django, I'm new to this sand and found zeronet amazing, I wanted to know if it is possible to program Zites with Django or will I have to focus on Javascript and CSS? I prefer Python!
Sorry if it's an obvious question.
Thanks for listening.

1577635840_1M3fYtsjV4Xc11v9JinV78wbkSeQR.body:
> [dots](#comment_1_1BXdtJD8d5s813aPwKoxEjGWPaNGB8deNh): I'm pretty sure you can't use Django, make me know if I'm wrong! [...]

Thanks :)
